meta.label: Apply edits
meta.description: Copy the original dataset and override cells with values coming from the edits dataset.

inputRoles.name: original
inputRoles.label: Original dataset
inputRoles.description: Dataset made available to the Visual Edit functionality

inputRoles.name: edits
inputRoles.label: Edits to apply
inputRoles.description: Dataset of edits created by the 'replay-edits' recipe on an editlog

params.name: sep
params.label: ⚠️ DO NOT EDIT THIS RECIPE
params.description: This recipe is controlled by a Visual Edit webapp (see URL in the recipe details, by clicking on the (i) icon in the vertical menu bar on the right-hand side).
